ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you ever smoked/used cannabis?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: How old were you when you first tried cannabis?
Why did you first use cannabis? My friends were using it.
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Why did you first use cannabis? My family members were using it.
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Why did you first use cannabis? To feel better (to get relief from either physical or psychological discomfort)
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Why did you first use cannabis? Other
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Why did you first use cannabis? Other please explain
Do you currently use cannabis?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes; Please consider as current smokers all participants who report usually using smoking cannabis (incl. patients who have not smoked while inpatient/in prison and patients who report occasional use even if it is once every couple of years etc)

ElementDescription: Why did you continue to use cannabis?
Notes: 1= I like the effect, it gives me a buzz; 2= It makes me feel relaxed; 3= It makes me feel less nervous and anxious; 4= It makes me feel more sociable; 5= Other

ElementDescription: Please explain why you continue to use cannabis: Other
Would you like to stop using cannabis one day?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: If you would like to stop using cannabis one day, please explain
Does/did cannabis affect your health in any way
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: If cannabis did affect your health, please explain
If you are not a current user, how long ago did you stop smoking cannabis?
Notes: Specify in terms of months and/or years

ElementDescription: Why did you stop? Please explain
How do/did you mostly use cannabis?
Notes: 1= I smoke/smoked it in a joint with tobacco; 2= I smoke/smoked it in a joint without tobacco; 3= I smoke/smoked it using a bong or pipe; 4= I eat/ate or drink/drank it; 5= Other

ElementDescription: Please explain how you do/did mostly use cannabis
How often do/did you use cannabis?
Notes: 0= Occasionally (less than once per week); 1= (More than) once a week; 2= Daily

ElementDescription: When do/did you mostly use cannabis?
Notes: 1= During the day; 2= During the evening; 3= During the day and evening; 4= At weekends; 5= During weekends and weekdays

ElementDescription: Do you/did you mostly use cannabis:
Notes: 1= Socially (with friends); 2= On my own

ElementDescription: On average how much money per week do/did you usually spend on cannabis?
What type of cannabis do/did you mostly use?
Notes: 1= Flower/Leaf; 2= Hash; 3= Resin/Concentrates; 4= Other

ElementDescription: Please describe the type of cannabis (including dosage if known)
Why did you choose the above type?
RESEARCHER: Determine type of cannabis used
Notes: 1= Use types with THC < 10% (flower only, edibles with greater than 10mg THC); 2= Use types with THC > 10% (hash, resin/dabs/concentrates, edibles with greater than 10mg THC)

ElementDescription: Comments
CEQ Score
Notes: sum([ever_used_ceq], [currentuse_ceq], if([firstuse_ceq]< 16, 2, 1), [usefrequency_ceq], [spend_ceq], [type_admin_ceq])
